statements: SELECT * FROM landmarks
SELECT id, name, location FROM landmarks
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks WHERE location = 'Paris'
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, location FROM landmarks ORDER BY latitude ASC
SELECT name, location FROM landmarks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE latitude > 40.5 AND longitude < -73.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM landmarks WHERE location LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT id, name FROM points_of_interest;
SELECT name, location FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM points_of_interest WHERE type = 'Historical';
SELECT id, name, type FROM points_of_interest WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM points_of_interest WHERE type = 'Historical';
SELECT * FROM landmarks INNER JOIN points_of_interest ON landmarks.id = points_of_interest.id;
SELECT name, ST_X(location) AS longitude, ST_Y(location) AS latitude FROM points_of_interest WHERE type = 'Natural' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM landmarks;
SELECT name, location FROM points_of_interest WHERE type = 'Museum';
SELECT id, route_name, ST_AsText(route_path) AS route_description FROM map_routes;
SELECT name, ST_X(location) AS longitude, ST_Y(location) AS latitude FROM landmarks;
SELECT route_name, ST_Length(route_path) AS route_length FROM map_routes WHERE start_point_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM points_of_interest WHERE type = 'Museum';
SELECT name, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM landmarks WHERE id = 1;

SELECT route_name, (SELECT name FROM points_of_interest WHERE id = map_routes.start_point_id) AS start_point, (SELECT name FROM points_of_interest WHERE id = map_routes.end_point_id) AS end_point FROM map_routes;
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT name, location FROM points_of_interest WHERE category = 'Museum';
SELECT id, name, description FROM attractions ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, location.STAsText() AS location FROM routes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM points_of_interest WHERE category = 'Museum';
SELECT * FROM attractions WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT name, ST_AsText(location) AS formatted_location FROM landmarks WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name, ST_Distance(start_point, end_point) AS distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Landmarks;
SELECT name, location FROM PointsOfInterest ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT description, location FROM Routes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT name, date FROM Events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT landmark_id, rating, comment FROM Reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Landmarks;
SELECT name, description FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE category = 'Historical';
SELECT DISTINCT name, location FROM Routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT name, date FROM Events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT l.name AS landmark_name, r.distance AS route_distance FROM Landmarks l INNER JOIN Routes r ON l.location = r.start_location;
